testsuite.name: com.sample.modules.OfferPage
testsuite.system-out: Step 0 : Open URL - null Step 1 : Click oon super offer tab in header. Message : Normal Step 2 : Verify offer page opend. Step 3 : Click on hotels radio button. Step 4 : Click on axis checkbox. Step 5 : Verify all offers have axis bank logo with terms and conditions. Message : PASS : verifyOfferPageHotelAxisFilter

Step 0 : Open URL - null Step 1 : Click oon super offer tab in header. Message : Normal Step 2 : Verify offer page opend. Step 3 : Click on trending radio button. Step 4 : Click on icici checkbox. Step 5 : Verify all offers have icici bank logo with terms and conditions. Message : PASS : verifyOfferPageTrendingICICIFilter

Step 0 : Open URL - null Step 1 : Click oon super offer tab in header. Message : Normal Step 2 : Verify offer page opend. Step 3 : Click on flights radio button. Step 4 : Click on hdfc checkbox. Step 5 : Verify all offers have hdfc bank logo with terms and conditions. Message : PASS : verifyOfferPageFllightsHDFCFilter
